description:
When a server returns a 300 response code to indicate there are multiple available URLs for the entity being requested, it has the option of setting the Location header to the preferred or primary representation. The client may, at its option, choose to redirect to that location.

When getting a /servers/{id} there is a 'bookmark' link. When getting that link the v2 and v2.1 links are present in the choices. Seems like it would make sense to put the v2.1 link in the location header to express the preference.
title: server bookmark link returns 300 and choices without a location header
